Negative_Review: Bathroom sink would not drain housekeeper was way too early and kept coming back Sunday morning
Positive_Review: Great atmosphere and design Exactly what you expect from a hotel near the Opera House Very Parisienne Staff very helpful

Negative_Review: I arrived after my husband so didn t check in myself but facilities seemed to be limited but that may not be an accurate representation
Positive_Review: The room was small but luxuriously furnished The bed was exceptionally comfortable The street was very quiet but close to major attractions and loads of cafes and restaurants so an exceptional location

Negative_Review: The room is quite small as everywhere else in Paris People yelling in the street at 11 pm the hotel is in front of the Olympia s back door is not very pleasant even though it is out of the hotel s control The room service came twice in the afternoon and entered the room for no apparent reason and retreated immediately after realizing I was there It doesn t feel safe
Positive_Review: The bed is very confortable Very pleasant stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location for a visit to Paris Upon arrival we were greeted warmly and provided with a room upgrade due to us celebrating a special occasion The friendly hotel staff were very kind and thoughtful throughout our visit providing helpful advice on places to visit in the city and attending to our needs Breakfast was lovely with the option of an omelette made up to our desire and a perfect cappuccino We would highly recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: Our second bedroom decor for room 504 was a little overwhelming especially with the lower ceilingsand bright red pattern material on all walls
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfy and a good power shower Fresh pastries for breakfast with a choice of continental breakfast and cooked eggs Hermes products for that touch of luxury

Negative_Review: A different power wall plug from what I m using in my country
Positive_Review: Everything is good about this hotel Very well designed Plenty of restaurant in the area Close proximity to the station

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The place is small and intimate Service is super personal with a note from the manager every time I stay Rooms are small but equipped with everything you need Hermes toiletries a big bonus the whole place smells delicious

Negative_Review: I couldn t figure out the heating cooling system in my room and literally woke up sweating a couple of nights But with the window open I was fine
Positive_Review: Super comfortable bed amazing location near plenty of shops a few small grocery stores metro bus lines and tourist attractions I would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: Room too small Perfect for 1 or 2 tiny persons not the bed but surrounding the bed and to move around
Positive_Review: Excellent and lovely staff the decoration excellent bed linen and toiletries great location

Negative_Review: Had to cut my stay from a week to couple of days due to emergency But they still have charged me in full and were not willing to discuss any solution whatsoever So be prepared for poor and unprofessional treatment
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The room was not comfortable as it was small We knew that hotel was a boutique hotel but common spaces were very small so we didn t feel comfortable to use them and stay after breakfast for a coffee or at the afternoon for a drink Breakfast was rather poor with no big variety although the polite staff made omelets especially for us
Positive_Review: Hotel staff was very very polite and helpful to every request we had thank you all Very comfortable beds with nice pillows

Negative_Review: It was bit overpriced the time I booked but that was all across Paris
Positive_Review: Great location in a classy district of Paris very clean and comfortable staff are very helpful

Negative_Review: The commun area are not really large The breakfast area is tiny so is also the breakfast buffet as there is absolutely no room for a big large buffet everything is in miniature Tiny croissant tiny viennoiserie tiny cup of coffee So if you are looking for a gargantuesque breakfast this one is not for you But for a light good breakfast it is ok It is not expensive as it is 18euro per person But in comparaison with the normal rate of the room 470 a night the breakfast would for sure need to be improved and offer much more choice
Positive_Review: The staff is pretty young and do their best to please the guest

Negative_Review: While the rooms are a bit small they are also very dark Even with the curtains open and all the lights on very dark Shower has plenty of room but the sink area is extremely small Please pass on the breakfast the presentation may have most of the items one would desire but the presentation is so skimpy one feel hesitant to take any food Kind of Like Tom Hanks and the caviar in Got Mail They need to up this area especially since they charge 18eu
Positive_Review: Location was perfect for a Christmas visit to Paris Very close to all the best shopping Many places to relax dine in the immediate area Only Sorry I missed seeing Scarlet Johanson at the grand opening of a place close to us

Negative_Review: Booking com said breakfast was included and we had to pay at the end That was the only issue throughout the stay
Positive_Review: The service as a whole brilliant service throughout our whole stay

Negative_Review: Could not fault anything
Positive_Review: Ideally situated in the heart of Paris Friendly polite happy staff The style is very romantic It is small but we wouldn t want anything more as we wanted to eat out and enjoy Paris at its best

Negative_Review: The room was too small toilet flush was a bit dodgy and the bathtub could really use a shower curtain
Positive_Review: The lounge compact but cozy Fancy collection of toiletries and the fuzzy slippers

Negative_Review: The room is very small but we had full day shopping so when we came back home at night after dinner fallen asleep quickly with a comfy bed so still perfect
Positive_Review: Secured 24 hours parking 38 at front of our hotel A few walk to Rue Cambon only 5 mins to walk Shampoo and soap were My favourite Hermes

Negative_Review: The bedroom was very small but we expected this and the room was dimly lit but this was consistent with the hotel style I ended up packing my bag near the wardrobe mini bar which had a brighter light
Positive_Review: Beautiful room in a classically decorated classy hotel The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was amazing Lovely Hermes toiletries too and beautiful crystal glasses in the room The staff were exceptionally friendly polite and helpful We had a very early checkout and it was no problem This hotel is very conveniently located close to the Opera House department stores and CDG airport bus just a 5 min walk There is also a fabulous restaurant just around the corner Next time we will check out the very cool looking bar near reception This is a beautiful part of Paris and it was a treat to stay here

Negative_Review: small room and expensive I didnt get a receipt for the extras
Positive_Review: excellent decoration super location very friendly stuff tasty and fresh breakfast and amusing music

Negative_Review: There was a huge leak in the room it shut down the electricity and AC They had no technician the receptionist tried in vein to fix it with a screw driver He stopped the leak and restored half the power I ended up with no AC and no lights in the bathroom for the duration of my stay It was the hottest night of the year I had a very important meetingh in the morning and couldn t even comb my hair as the bathroom was blacked out NO replacement room or any compensation was offered I demand a refund I have used booking com many many times this is the first time I have requested a refund but I must insist or I will have to change to Agoda
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Interiors are little tired Tip invest a little in some renovation Very loud sawing and banging in the morning was quite surprising and very discomforting but overlooked
Positive_Review: Surrounded by cafes Few minutes walking to Lafayette Opera and metro Great interior concept

Negative_Review: scented candles were a little overpowering
Positive_Review: the room was wonderful location is great walking distance to so many things Staff were friendly We mostly dealt with Sam who was so helpful especially since we had arrived without our luggage and interesting to talk to A really good front of house person Our bed was the most comfortable bed either of us has ever slept in

Negative_Review: Wifi sometimes unstable Room and elevator are a bit dim
Positive_Review: Good location 5 mins wak to Opera Auber and Madeleine railway station as well as Roissy bus station Staffs are nice and friendly and quick respose when I sent special request before arriving Paris

Negative_Review: Booked a classic room which all show as having a patio There s only one with a patio and you have to request it
Positive_Review: Attentive friendly staff comfortable quiet room nice toiletries

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The property is gorgeous and unique Room was very comfortable The staff was incredible polite and genuine If you want to be in a great location away from tourist madness this is a great place to be

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and helpful the hotel was close to everything and the metro was only a few minutes walk With a personalized handwritten welcome note just tops everything off Perfect perfect perfect Definitely will come back again

Negative_Review: The lighting in the room was atmospheric it suited the decor and created a lovely intimate feel but not very helpful when trying to put your make up on
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly welcoming and friendly They were so helpful when we had travel and pick pocketing problems Although a small hotel it really gave an intimate and boutique feel The decor was lovely the room wasn t a bad size for a city hotel Breakfast was continental type with nice little bar for a G T too I would return again

Negative_Review: I woke up in the middle of the night and could smell cigarette smoke from one of the other rooms That wasn t pleasant
Positive_Review: I loved the hotel itself The room was lovely and great little bar downstairs Staff were very friendly

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff polite helpful friendly knowing our needs before we express them Some minor technical problems were fixed immediately Rooms with personality and real clean all day long Location superb I wish the hotel keeps always that high service level Highly recommended

Negative_Review: The shower ceiling needs tidying a little that s all
Positive_Review: Fantastic small boutique hotel The breakfast was light but really well cooked and presented The decor is very sexy and cosy The bed was like a marshmallow we wanted to stay longer Hermes toiletries in the bathroom and the whole place has a lovely scent throughout

Negative_Review: Not a thing
Positive_Review: The staff are wonderful very helpful nothing is too much trouble The room was good bed very comfortable and the shower was great Would definitely go back

Negative_Review: All good
Positive_Review: Excellent location for shopping restaurants and access to metro Room is small but that is Paris Bed is super comfortable and shower is good Decorations of hotel is very quaint and staff were very helpful with good English language skills

Negative_Review: The elevator door closed on my shoulder and left me in pain I accept that mistakes happen but I was hurt afterwards Nonetheless I would rate the hotel highly It s a great place to stay with amazing rooms and great staff
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful and friendly The hotel had a relaxed atmosphere and was without a doubt brilliantly located in the heart of Paris

Negative_Review: The lighting in the room could be a little better
Positive_Review: Great hotel in a central location just a few minutes walk from Vendome Place de la Concorde and the Champs Elysee The hotel is small but beautifully decorated The staff were very friendly and organised our airport transfers and gave us an iphone charger when we realised we didn t have one The room was small but perfectly appointed and again decorated lovely The staff were very friendly and helpful throughout We had breakfast on our last day which was lovely with the staff offering to make whatever we wanted there was also plenty fruit bread pastries and juice on offer Great hotel and I would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: small room poor lightening the darkness of the entrance no ketler in the room 4 stars hotel
Positive_Review: excellent team excellent location close of everything

Negative_Review: Very small name outside so you have to count the doors to find the number but once inside all was forgiven with friendly and helpful staff The odd light bulb broken and no English news Chanel which might be taken as a plus
Positive_Review: Staff great small and personal

Negative_Review: there is nothing
Positive_Review: This is an outstanding hotel and well worth a visit great staff great location and the rooms unbelievable all i can say book book book

Negative_Review: I prepaid with booking com yet the hotel had my partner pay again in cash on checkout whilst I was in the room I queried this and showed the confirmation email of payment from booking com but the receptionist absolutely insisted it wasn t prepaid On returning home as my credit card had obviously been charged previously I reclaimed from booking com who refunded 20 less than they initially charged to it I ve followed it up 3 times now and still haven t been refunded in full So down 20 through no fault of my own
Positive_Review: Excellent location lovely decor helpful staff
